chunk:
Aesop Parsley Seed Anti-Oxidant Facial Treatment

Brand: Aesop

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Triolein, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Ribes Ni

sostearate, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ormenis Multicaulis Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Oil, , Glycine

ower Oil, , Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Carum Petroselinum (Parsley) Seed Oil, Squalane, Vegetable Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
